quote: Breckin, this is Holder. Holder is not my boyfriend, but if I catch him trying to break the record for best first kiss with another girl, then he'll soon be my not breathing non-boyfriend.
quote_letters: BRECKIN THIS IS HOLDER HOLDER IS NOT MY BOYFRIEND BUT IF I CATCH HIM TRYING TO BREAK THE RECORD FOR BEST FIRST KISS WITH ANOTHER GIRL THEN HELL SOON BE MY NOT BREATHING NON-BOYFRIEND
